text:
~Mya EqvAva#gataqH sO&pa# ruddhyatEq yO&pa#ruddhaqH sO&va# gacCatiq yadi# kAqmayE#ta praqjA mu#hyEyuqriti# paqSUn vyati#ShajEt praqjA Eqva mO#hayatiq yada#BivAhaqtO#&pAM ~MvA#ruqNamAqlaBE#ta praqjA varu#NO gRuhNIyAd-dakShiNaqta uda#~jcaqmA la#BatE&pavAhaqtO#&pAM praqjAnAq-mava#ruNa grAhAya || 23 
(rEtOq - yaja#mAnE dadhAti - lOqka aiqndra(gm) - saqptatri(gm)#Sacca) (A5)
